Where programme cost weighting comes from

The weighting is based on the sector subject area classification for each student’s core aim. It is calculated from the autumn census 2020.

Where average deprivation uplift comes from

It is calculated using student’s home postcode from the autumn census 2020 and the index of multiple deprivation 2015.
